results.title: Simvastatin Inhibits Histologic Changes Associated with Gastroduodenal Reflux in a Murine Model.
results.text_hl: DGEA @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ fed a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-containing diet had an attenuated response to @DISEASE_Gastroesophageal_Reflux @DISEASE_MESH:D005764 @@@reflux@@@, with a significant reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@mucosal hyperplasia@@@ and proliferation (p < 0.0001).

citations.NLM: Gergen AK, Madsen HJ, Li A, Cheng L, Meng X, Fullerton DA, Pratap A, Weyant MJ. Simvastatin Inhibits Histologic Changes Associated with Gastroduodenal Reflux in a Murine Model. Dig Dis Sci. 2022 Oct;67(10):4732-4741. PMID: 35001242

results.title: Simvastatin reduces venous stenosis formation in a murine hemodialysis vascular access model
results.text_hl: In this study, we used a high dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and observed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated vessels have decreased expression of @GENE_VEGFA @GENE_7422 @@@VEGF-A@@@ with a decrease in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@neointimal hyperplasia@@@.

citations.NLM: Janardhanan R, Yang B, Vohra P, Roy B, Withers S, Bhattacharya S, Mandrekar J, Kong H, Leof EB, Mukhopadhyay D, Misra S. Simvastatin reduces venous stenosis formation in a murine hemodialysis vascular access model Kidney Int. 2013 Aug;84(2):338-52. PMID: 23636169

results.title: Influence of simvastatin on hepatocytes - histopathological and immunohistochemical study.
results.text_hl: Apoptosis was visualized by terminal deoxynucleotidyl transferase @CHEMICAL_deoxyuridine_triphosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C027078 @@@dUTP@@@ nick-end labelling (TUNEL). @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ administration caused acute @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@hepatocyte swelling@@@, @DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006008 @@@glycogen depletion@@@, hyperaemia, multifocal hepatocyte proliferation with occasional pseudoacinar formation, connective tissue @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@hyperplasia@@@, @DISEASE_Hypereosinophilic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D017681 @@@eosinophil@@@ infiltration, and interface @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Mikiewicz M, Otrocka-Domagała I, Paździor-Czapula K. Influence of simvastatin on hepatocytes - histopathological and immunohistochemical study. Pol J Vet Sci. 2019 Jun;22(2):263-270. PMID: 31269349

results.title: Simvastatin exerts favourable effects on neointimal formation in a mouse model of vein graft.
results.text_hl: However, it is not known if @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ actually inhibits @DISEASE_Stenosis_Pulmonary_Vein @DISEASE_MESH:D000071078 @@@vein@@@ graft @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@intima hyperplasia@@@ in vivo, and the underlying mechanisms behind that.

citations.NLM: Zhang L, Lu H, Huang J, Guan Y, Sun H. Simvastatin exerts favourable effects on neointimal formation in a mouse model of vein graft. Eur J Vasc Endovasc Surg. 2011 Sep;42(3):393-9. PMID: 21693384
